review_data.title: Fantastic and cousy bar in Central Zurich!
review_data.content: Very cousy atmosphere and always super friendly staff. Easy to reach (just next to Zurich HB). The event organiser - Viktoriia Sclauzero is coming up with many great ideas. We had experienced a vodka tasting (Vodka Masterclass) with many different types of typical vodkas (flavours,...More

review_data.title: Great for a cheeky drink
review_data.content: Went here for a vodka class/tasting and found out apparently my favorite vodka is with horse radish! 10/10 would visit again

review_data.title: A great place for a friends night out
review_data.content: Nice, cozy bar, perfect for a friends’ night out with a great choice of drinks and snacks 🍹🍢🥪 I’ve visited V-Bar only once so far, but will come back for sure!

review_data.title: Lively bar with good food
review_data.content: We experienced Russian/Ukrainian entertainment in Zurich - blini with caviar, khachapuri (Georgian cheese bread) with a good range of drinks. Karaoke as well, with a large selection of Russian and Western songs. Drink, sing and be merry.

review_data.title: Vbar
review_data.content: nice place in the center of Zurich to have drink; vodka with chaviar and blini, wide assortment of wines, cheese and georgian khachapuri..Everething is tasty and good made me to
